reviews.review_msg: Mediocre lecturer at most. Unreachable other than the class day, even on piazza. The course is built around an OS designed for teaching. Whether you can gain some insights into general OSs from the assignments is debatable. No written exam, but easy marks from clickers and an oral exam. Overall a weirdly designed course. Dont think I learned much.

If this course isn't changed, it'll be an infamous killer for CPEN students. I'm not exaggerating when I say assnt4&5 will take about 40 hours, and assnt6 60+. The course is based off of the OS course taught at Harvard. Your task is essentially to complete an operating system. Resources such as videos from other schools will be helpful.
